column4: hey guys I'm trying to install 7.10 on some new dell servers, two of them installed with 0 issues, on the last one its not locating any of the hardware in the setup,  anyone have any clues?
odd.  You using the alternative installer cd? or  desktop cd? or server cd?
you may want to check the forums for that exact make/model server.  Or ya could just swap some hds around. to see.
